          <title>
            <string language="sl">Solenoid</string>
            <string language="en">Slinky solenoid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schleichendes Solenoid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solénoïde furtif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solenóide slinky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solenoide slinky</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tuljava pridobljena z večkratnim navitjem vodnika okrog valja.</string>
            <string language="en">The construction of a inductor with wire wrapped around the cylinder.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufbau einer Drosselspule mit der Leitung 
aufgewickelt um den Zylinder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La construction d'un inducteur avec le fil 
enroulé autour du cylindre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A construção de um indutor com o fio envolvido 
em torno do cilindro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La costruzione di un induttore con legare avvolto
intorno al cilindro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατασκευή ενός πηνίου το καλώδιο που τυλίγεται με 
γύρω από τον κύλινδρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La construcción de un inductor con el alambre 
envuelto alrededor del cilindro.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
